title: Plants vs Zombies v1.3.4 Android
description:
Plants vs. Zombies v1.3.4
Requirements: Android OS 1.5 + 
Overview: Stem a zombie attack on your Android!


Get ready to soil your plants in the hit PopCapÃ‚Â® game! A mob of fun-loving zombies is about to invade your home, and your only defense is an arsenal of 49 zombie-zapping plants. Use peashooters, wall-nuts, cherry bombs and more to slow down, confuse, weaken and mulchify 26 types of zombies before they can reach your front door.

**GAME ALERT** Did you know TetrisÃ‚Â® FREE has been downloaded over 10 million times on Google Play? See for yourself why millions of people have made the official TetrisÃ‚Â® game a must-have on their devices.**
